h2_title: How to Get the Sobering Stone for the Yellow-Robed Squire - Method 2
content: Giving him the Stone Essence will result in you needing to attack him. But once you've shown him who's boss, he'll turn into a merchant. The Sobering Stone costs 6,480 Will from him.
